III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The agency is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The agency was offered technical assistance in the following areas:
• Consultant provided the administration team with information on how to find
additional training resources, such as through the Child Welfare In-Service
Training booklet.

V. CONSULTATION
The agency was offered consultation in the following areas:
• There was no consultation requested or required.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
Maltreatment in Care
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
Corrective Action Plan Compliance
The agency has not been required to submit any corrective action plans during this
period under review.
Financial Overview
There are no financial concerns identified based on the review of the facility's
budget and the agency's financial audit.
PREA compliance (if applicable)
Not Applicable
Chief Administrator Assessment
Not Applicable
Staff and Youth Interviews
Staff interviews were conducted during the inspection and staff noted they enjoy
their jobs. One staff reported they appreciate the longevity of staff that work at the
facility and the knowledge base of staff at the facility. Staff all reported feeling
supported by their direct supervisor and administration. When asked about
training, staff reported they wished there was more variety of training to choose
from. This information was provided to administration.
Three youth were interviewed during the inspection. All the youth reported feeling
safe at the facility and having positive relationships with staff. The youth reported
they enjoy the gym time at the facility. The youth within the treatment program
reported they enjoyed being able to wear regular clothing and having more of an
open setting.

Description of Agency Walk Through
An onsite inspection and walkthrough of the facility occurred on October 2, 2024.
There were no issues or safety concerns noted.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the agency is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes. It is recommended that the agency be issued a renewal of their regular
license.
